title: Change the language in wrapper file
content:
When OO Workflow Designer was installed, there was an option to select a supported language in addition to English. This language support is required if, for example, you need to ping a server that is configured in Japanese. You can change this language by editing the designer-wrapper.conf file.

  1. Open the designer-wrapper.conf file in a text editor (located under <installation_folder>/designer/conf).
  2. Edit the language property. For example, change wrapper.lang=en_US to wrapper.lang=ja_JP.
  3. Save the designer-wrapper.conf file.
